item.title: Data from: Density triggers maternal hormones that increase adaptive offspring growth in a wild mammal
item.description: Sources Background Reproducibility Effect of spruce cone availability on local density (Fig. 1B) Effect of Density on growth rate (Fig. 2/Table S2) Effect of Density on fecal cortisol metabolites (Fig. 3/Table S4) Effect of FCM on offspring growth rate (Table S5) Effect of experiment Cortisol on growth rate (Table S6) Red flags Effect of Density on growth rate (Fig. 2/Table S2) Growth rate is a change score and is confounding by the basline Figure 2 doesnâ€™t make sense Effect of Density on fecal cortisol metabolites (Fig.
